name: Turbo Sports Car Racing Game - Challenging Thumb Car Race 3D 2016
name_original: Turbo Sports Car Racing Game - Challenging Thumb Car Race 3D 2016
description:
*** Get ready for a breath taking 3D car racing game where you get to drive real racing cars on a crazy asphalt tracks Discover Thumb Car Racing, the car racing game that can be played with the thumb in portrait mode. Best racer takes it all! ***

Turbo Sports Car Racing is one of best mobile racing games you have been looking for in racing games category. Ever wanted to try sports Car simulator with controls easy to learn? Now you can race and experience the drive of sports car for free, meanwhile feel true car driving experience. Drive the fastest turbo sports cars of the world at extreme speed and feel the asphalt of the track with extreme drifts, there will be sharp turns which will leave a lot of yours car’s skid marks on the track!
In Turbo Sports Car Racing, fulfill your fever of racing and drifting. Turbo Sports Car Racing is a multi-level game. In each level you have to complete all laps without crashing your car. Also avoid accidents with other sports car. Let’s play Turbo Sports Car Racing.
This racing game is all about living life on the edge! Get READY to drive astonishing sports cars through perilous racing tracks! This is the racing game you have been waiting for in racing games category!

Experience a lot of Pick-ups to complete the race:
Fuel Lane
Fuel Lane will come in each lap to fulfill your car’s fuel need. Shield Pack
Shield pack will give you extra power to become invisible.
Repair pack
Repair pack will repair your car’s health.

How to Play:

- Gameplay is very easy, Just swipe left or right to change your lane
- Auto acceleration, Auto brakes and auto turns with a lot of drifting
- Collect virtual cash from the track to unlock new cars
- Pick different Pickups during race
- Experience the thrills of real racing and drifting.

Features of Turbo Sports Car Racing:

- Amazingly detailed HD cars based on real sports cars models.
- Multiple camera angles to enhance the view.
- Smooth and realistic arcade racing game.
- Different Daytime conditions.
- A full catalog of 5 different sports cars real 3D models.
- Easy to learn and drive.
- Control like real car drive simulator.
- Supported for all devices including iPad Pro
